div.head: Description of changes for 2012.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is constructed from a copy of the St. Victor diplomatic transcription. It awaits corrections and additions as a result of a collation comparision between manuscript witnesses. A transcription of the Sorbonne ms. witnesses also needs to be completed. Citations, cross-references, and critical apparatus all still await completiong.
